name: Fuxi
temple_description:
Fuxi was the beginning of the humanities of the Chinese nation and one of the three ancient emperors with immense power. 
She created divination and the Eight Trigrams based on the changes of heaven and earth. 
Additionally, she invented writing to replace the practice of knotting ropes for record-keeping. 
Fuxi also taught humanity fishing and hunting, earning the utmost respect from mankind.

active_skills.name: Taichi
active_skills.effect: Has a 50% chance to stun enemies for 1 round.

active_skills.name: Harmony of Man and Nature
active_skills.effect: Restores HP equal to 70% of her ATK.
